purpose: The email announces the Call for Papers for the ACM/IEEE International Symposium on Code Generation and Optimization (CGO 2026), inviting researchers and practitioners to submit their work. It provides important deadlines for paper submission, author rebuttal, and notification of acceptance. The conference aims to gather contributions on optimization and code generation techniques.
evidence_sentences: The Call for Papers is out for the next International Symposium on Code Generation and Optimization (CGO’26), taking place next year in Sydney, Australia.
The first submission round is coming up, with the following deadlines: Paper Submission: 29 May 2025, Author Rebuttal Period: 8–10 July 2025, Paper Notification: 21 July 2025.

CGO provides a premier venue to bring together researchers and practitioners working at the interface of hardware and software on a wide range of optimization and code generation techniques and related issues.
